name: blockchain
description: This directory contains the smart contracts and deployment scripts for the Academic Records blockchain system.

scripts.build:circuits: npm run compile:circuits && npm run generate:keys
scripts.generate:keys: npm run download:ptau && npm run setup:keys
scripts.download:ptau: mkdir -p circuits && [ ! -f circuits/pot12_final.ptau ] && npm run generate:ptau || echo 'PTAU file already exists'
scripts.setup:keys: snarkjs groth16 setup ../public/circuits/access-control.r1cs circuits/pot12_final.ptau ../public/circuits/access-control_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute ../public/circuits/access-control_0000.zkey ../public/circuits/access-control_0001.zkey --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey ../public/circuits/access-control_0001.zkey circuits/verification_key.json
scripts.generate:ptau: npx snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 circuits/pot12_0000.ptau -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau contribute circuits/pot12_0000.ptau circuits/pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 circuits/pot12_0001.ptau circuits/pot12_final.ptau -v
